forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. The rain and snow will change to all rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
